roleset.name: force acceptance deceptively
roleset.note: FOIST-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire (from foist.01-v)

example.name: Passive
example.text: The education system gives children hardly any opportunity for * making choices, and education-1 is foisted *-1 on them rather than * being something *0* they seek for themselves.
example.arg: rather than being something *0* they seek for themselves
